SELECT idx.id FROM tb_image_index AS idx LEFT JOIN tb_space AS s ON idx.space_id = s.id LEFT JOIN tb_member AS m ON idx.space_id = m.space_id AND m.user_id = #{userId} WHERE idx.id IN #{id} AND ( idx.user_id = #{userId} OR ((m.permission_mask & 16777216) = 16777216 ))

WITH deleted_items_size AS ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(tii.size), 0) AS total_deleted_size FROM tb_image_item tii WHERE tii.idx_id IN #{id} ), delete_index AS ( DELETE FROM tb_image_index WHERE id IN #{id} RETURNING id ) SELECT total_deleted_size FROM deleted_items_size
